results.title: Simvastatin-loaded liposomal nanoparticles as treatment for adenomyosis in a patient-derived xenograft mouse model: a pilot study.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ has recently shown promise for treating gynaecological conditions such as @<m>DISEASE_Endometriosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004715 @@@endometriosis@@@ and uterine fibroids with nanoliposomal formulations demonstrating improved efficacy.

citations.NLM: Michel R, Vincent KL, Kirschen GW, Motamedi M, Saada J, Yang J, Ozpolat B, Kilic GS, Borahay MA. results.title: Simvastatin decreases invasiveness of human endometrial stromal cells.
results.text_hl: Furthermore, we found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment reduces the number and the size of endometrial implants in a nude @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Endometriosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D004715 @@@endometriosis@@@.
